content.text:
# List of Donald Trump 2024 presidential campaign non-political endorsements

This is a list of notable non-political figures and organizations that endorsed Donald Trump for the 2024 U.S. presidential election.
Notable military personnel
]]
]]
]]
Air Force
* Buzz Aldrin, retired NASA astronaut and U.S. Air Force brigadier general
* John J. Closner III, retired U.S. Air Force major general
* John D. Logeman, retired U.S. Air Force major general
* Thomas McInerney, retired U.S. Air Force lieutenant general
* Scott O'Grady, retired U.S. Air Force captain
* Bentley Rayburn, retired U.S. Air Force major general
Army
* Burwell B. Bell III, retired U.S. Army general
* David Bellavia, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army staff sergeant
* Patrick Henry Brady, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army major general
* Sam Brown, retired U.S. Army captain and Republican nominee for U.S. Senate from Nevada in 2024
* Sammy L. Davis, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army sergeant first class
* Michael John Fitzmaurice, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army specialist four
* Harold A. Fritz, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army lieutenant colonel
* Joe Kent, retired U.S. Army Special Forces Chief Warrant Officer III and Republican nominee for U.S. Representative from WA-03 in 2022 and 2024
* Peter C. Lemon, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army sergeant
* Gary L. Littrell, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army command sergeant major
* James McCloughan, Medal of Honor recipient and retired U.S. Army specialist five

* Paul E. Vallely, retired U.S. Army major general
* Ronald L. Watts, retired U.S. Army lieutenant general
